bike.description: Hi-Ten steel, No Oval Head tube, seat-stay mounted X-wire "U" brake bosses, w/ braze on cable stops, 6mm dropouts

components.description: Specialized threadless, 1-1/8", reinforced steerer, 1-1/4" blades, 6mm dropout thickness, w/ 25mm OD fork adapters
Specialized 2-piece, 150mm rise, 600mm width, 8 degree back-sweep, 2 degree up-sweep, 600mm width
Rush RX4.0, forged caliper, soft compound pads
Rush RX220-R, u-brake, low profile pivot, soft compound brakes
KMC Z-510, 1/2" x 1/8", w/ Anti-drop inner links, 88 links
Specialized 1-piece, heat treated Hi-Ten, 175mm crank arms
Solid Alloy disc, 44t, 5mm thick, CNC'd center/drive hole and teeth
1/2", Cr-Mo axle, alloy platform, w/ molded pins
Alex Y-303, 20", 48h, alloy, single wall, ground side wall, treated brake surface,
Specialized alloy, 48h, 3/8" Cr-Mo axle, loose ball
Specialized alloy, 48h, 3/8" Cr-Mo axle, loose ball
Specialized Jumping, w/8mm rails and X-brace
